# (PART) R essentials {-}

# Introduction

Some introductory text idk. Hello world.

Documents that support this book

* [*An Introduction to R*](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-intro.html) by Venables, Smith, and the R Core Team. Abbreviated as "intro-r". PDF download [here](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-intro.pdf).
* [*R Language Definition*](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-lang.html) by the R Core Team. Abbreviated as "rldef". PDF download [here](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-lang.pdf).
* [*Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/) by Hadley Wickham. Abbreviated as "adv-r".
* [*R for Data Science*](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/) by Grolemund and Wickham. Abbreviated as "r4ds".




## Readings

* [intro-r - 1 - Introduction](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-intro.html#Introduction-and-preliminaries)
    * skip 1.2 through 1.6
* [r4ds - 4 - Workflow: basics](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/workflow-basics.html)
* [r4ds - 6 - Workflow: scripts](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/workflow-scripts.html)
* [r4ds - 8 - Workflow: projects](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/workflow-projects.html)
* [rldef - 3.2 Control structures](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-release/R-lang.html#Control-structures)
    * skip subsections
* [adv-r - 3 - Names and values](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/names-values.html)
    * may not be useful until future readings are completed
* [Vocabulary](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/Vocabulary.html) from *Advanced R - 1st Edition*
    * may not be useful until future readings are completed
* [Hadley Wickham's style guide](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/Style.html)
* [Google's R style guide](https://google.github.io/styleguide/Rguide.xml)
* [adv-r - 26 - Optimising code](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/profiling.html)
